attribute_fields.comments: Just to begin with, this table checks the Meta Data of a document file.

initial_action_details.initial_action_description: add the document_set_metadata to the context of this table;

condition_details.condition_comment: We have to have an application

condition_details.condition_postfix: result.schip_application entitypush isvalid entitypop false beq

action_details.action_comment: Construct a view of the relationships in the application
Check for Medicaid Eligibility
Check for SCHIP Eligibility

action_details.action_description: add a new MI_MV_record entity to the context of this table
add the MI_MV_record to the MI_MV_records
set error_msg = "No clients on the SCHIP Application are filing for services"
action_details.action_postfix: "No clients on the SCHIP Application are filing for services" cvs /error_msg xdef

action_details.action_description: add the schip_application to the context of this table; add the document_metadata to the context of this table;

action_details.action_comment: Suggest the program for the individual
Set the case level status

attribute_fields.comments: Check all the documents for MI and Validity

context_details.context_description: for all document_set.documents
add the document_metadata to the context of this table
add the document_payload_data to the context of this table

condition_details.condition_comment: You have to have at least one individual on the application that is applying for SCHIP
condition_details.condition_description: there is an individual where the programs_applied_for is not null and programs_applied_for's pgm_type_applied_for == SCHIP
condition_details.condition_postfix: { true } { false } { programs_applied_for isnull not { pop programs_applied_for entitypush pgm_type_applied_for cvs entitypop SCHIP streq } over if } individuals forfirstelse

condition_details.condition_comment: We have to have pay
condition_details.condition_postfix: paystub entitypush pstb_gross_pay_amount cvs entitypop cvr isnull

condition_details.condition_comment: And we have to have a date
condition_details.condition_postfix: paystub entitypush pstb_payperiod_end_date cvs entitypop cvd isnull

condition_details.condition_comment: And we have to have a frequency
condition_details.condition_postfix: paystub entitypush pstb_payperiod_frequency cvs entitypop isnull

condition_details.condition_comment: We have to have a date of birth
condition_details.condition_postfix: birth_certificate entitypush brth_individual entitypop entitypush brth_cert_dob cvs entitypop cvd isnull

condition_details.condition_comment: If someone isn't a us citizen
condition_details.condition_postfix: passport entitypush pass_nationality cvs entitypop "US" streq

condition_details.condition_comment: no expiration date, then it is bad
condition_details.condition_postfix: passport entitypush pass_expiration_date cvs entitypop cvd isnull

action_details.action_comment: Mark the document as invalid
If we find a valid SCHIP application, keep a pointer to it

attribute_fields.comments: Adds to each individual the documents associated with the individual

context_details.context_description: for the first of the document_set.documents where the document_payload_data's schip_application is not null
context_details.context_postfix: dup { document_payload_data entitypush schip_application entitypop isnull not } document_set.documents forfirst pop

context_details.context_description: local string application_dcn = the document's document_metadata's doc_dcn
context_details.context_postfix: document entitypush document_metadata entitypop entitypush doc_dcn cvs entitypop cvs allocate execute deallocate pop

context_details.context_description: for all result.individuals

for all mtch_individuals where there is a docset_entity in the docset_entitys where docset_entity.dset_dcn == the application_dcn and docset_entity.dset_individual_id == the individual.individual's mapping key
context_details.context_postfix: { dup { true } { false } { docset_entity.dset_dcn cvs 0 local@ streq { pop docset_entity.dset_individual_id cvs individual.individual entitypush "mapping*key" cvn execute entitypop streq } over if } docset_entitys forfirstelse if } mtch_individuals forall pop

context_details.context_description: for all document_set.documents where the isValid == true and there is a docset_entity in the docset_entitys where document's document_metadata's doc_dcn == dset_dcn
context_details.context_postfix: { dup isValid true { pop { true } { false } { document entitypush document_metadata entitypop entitypush doc_dcn cvs entitypop dset_dcn cvs streq } docset_entitys forfirstelse } over if beq if } document_set.documents forall pop

context_details.context_description: add the document_metadata to the context of this table
add the document_payload_data to the context of this table

initial_action_details.initial_action_comment: Use the current date as a default

action_details.action_description: add the document if not a member to the individual.income_documents
add the document if not a member to the individual.dob_documents
add the document if not a member to the individual.citizenship_documents

action_details.action_comment: Set the document date for paystubs
action_details.action_postfix: paystub entitypush pstb_payperiod_end_date cvs entitypop cvd cvd /document.document_date xdef
individual.demographics entitypush indv_dob cvs entitypop cvs /individual.dob xdef
Individual.key_Indicators entitypush indc_us_citizen_ind cvs entitypop cvs /individual.citizenship xdef
Individual.key_Indicators entitypush indc_active_in_medicaid_ind cvs entitypop cvs /individual.medicaid xdef

action_details.action_description: set individual.cin = the individual.individual's mapping key
action_details.action_postfix: individual.individual entitypush "mapping*key" cvn execute entitypop cvs /individual.cin xdef

action_details.action_description: add individual.individual's demographics's indv_full_name to the context of this table; set individual.cin = the indv_first_name + " " + indv_last_name + " "
action_details.action_postfix: individual.individual entitypush demographics entitypop entitypush indv_full_name entitypop entitypush indv_first_name cvs " " strconcat indv_last_name cvs strconcat " " strconcat cvs /individual.cin xdef

context_details.context_description: for all result.individuals
local entity ThisIndividual = individual
context_details.context_postfix: individual cve allocate execute deallocate pop

context_details.context_description: for all rel_to_another_inds
for all result.individuals

condition_details.condition_comment: I am comparing all individuals with all individuals. The question is wether ThisIndividual defines a relationship with the Indivdual at hand.
condition_details.condition_description: there is a rel_to_another_ind in ThisIndividual's rel_to_another_inds where the individual's mapping key == the attribute "idref" of the rel_to_another_ind
condition_details.condition_postfix: { true } { false } { individual entitypush "mapping*key" cvn execute entitypop rel_to_another_ind "idref" getXmlAttribute streq } 0 local@ entitypush rel_to_another_inds entitypop forfirstelse

condition_details.condition_comment: If we have a relationship between two people, then we don't add another
condition_details.condition_description: there is a relationship where the target == ThisIndividual and the source == the individual
condition_details.condition_postfix: { true } { false } { target 0 local@ req { pop source individual req } over if } relationships forfirstelse

action_details.action_description: add a new Relationship entity to the context of this table
add the relationship to the relationships
add a new Relationship entity to the context of this table
add the relationship to the relationships

initial_action_details.initial_action_comment: Count the people in the group
Calculate the Income for this case

condition_details.condition_comment: As long as SOME document provides income information, we can proceed

context_details.context_description: for all result.eligibilityIndividuals
for all Individual.edg_groups where the edg_group's program's ProgramType == SCHIP
context_details.context_postfix: { dup edg_group entitypush program entitypop entitypush ProgramType entitypop SCHIP streq if } Individual.edg_groups forall pop

context_details.context_description: add the edg_group.edg_individual to the context of this table
add the edg_group.program to the context of this table
local entity clientApplying = edg_individual
context_details.context_postfix: edg_individual cve allocate execute deallocate pop

context_details.context_description: local double FPL_LIMIT = FPL_Base + FPL_PerAdditionalPerson * (number of the edg_group.edg_individuals - 1)
context_details.context_postfix: FPL_Base FPL_PerAdditionalPerson edg_group.edg_individuals length 1 - fmul fadd cvr allocate execute deallocate pop

context_details.context_description: local int percent_of_FPL = ( (householdIncome's net's monthlyAmount) / FPL_LIMIT ) *100
context_details.context_postfix: householdIncome entitypush net entitypop entitypush monthlyAmount entitypop 1 local@ fdiv 100 fmul cvi allocate execute deallocate pop

context_details.context_description: for all edg_group.edg_individuals
add the edg_individual.individual to the context of this table

condition_details.condition_comment: Is this the client applying for services?
Is the household income less then or equal to 200% of the FPL? If the claimed income disqualifies the client, then there is no requirement to verify that income.

action_details.action_comment: The individual is eligible for SCHIP

action_details.action_description: add "we need " + NumPaystubsRequired + " for income verification" to the FPL's comments
action_details.action_postfix: "we need " NumPaystubsRequired strconcat " for income verification" strconcat FPL entitypush comments swap addto entitypop

action_details.action_comment: We are always going to generate this factor
action_details.action_postfix: 2 local@ cvi edg_group.FPL entitypush /percentage xdef entitypop

action_details.action_description: add a new EligibilityFactor entity to the context of this table;
add the EligibilityFactor to the EligibilityFactors;

action_details.action_comment: Indicate this factor's role in determining eligibility
Indicate this factor's role in determining eligibility

action_details.action_postfix: N cvs householdIncome entitypush /status xdef entitypop
N cvs individualIncome entitypush /status xdef entitypop

action_details.action_description: add "The FPL Limit for this household is "+FPL_LIMIT to the FPL's comments;
action_details.action_postfix: "The FPL Limit for this household is " 1 local@ strconcat FPL entitypush comments swap addto entitypop

action_details.action_description: add "The Household Income is "+householdIncome's net's monthlyAmount to the FPL's comments
action_details.action_postfix: "The Household Income is " householdIncome entitypush net entitypop entitypush monthlyAmount entitypop strconcat FPL entitypush comments swap addto entitypop

action_details.action_comment: If we have a date of birth, but no verification, MV
action_details.action_postfix: MV EligibilityFactor.statusModifiers over add_no_dups program.statusModifiers swap add_no_dups MV householdIncome entitypush statusModifiers entitypop over add_no_dups edg_individual.individualIncome entitypush statusModifiers entitypop swap add_no_dups

action_details.action_description: add the schip_application to the context of this table; add the document_metadata to the context of this table

action_details.action_comment: Missing dob information for applicant
action_details.action_description: add a new MI_MV_record entity to the context of this table
add the MI_MV_record to the MI_MV_records
set error_msg = "Client must provide "+ NumPaystubsRequired+" paystub(s) issued within the last "+PaystubPeriod+" month(s)"
action_details.action_postfix: "Client must provide " NumPaystubsRequired strconcat " paystub(s) issued within the last " strconcat PaystubPeriod strconcat " month(s)" strconcat cvs /error_msg xdef

action_details.action_description: set error_msg = "Client has provided "+ numberPaystubsUsed + " valid paystubs. However, clients must provide "+ NumPaystubsRequired+" issued within the last "+PaystubPeriod+" month(s)"
action_details.action_postfix: "Client has provided " numberPaystubsUsed strconcat " valid paystubs. However, clients must provide " strconcat NumPaystubsRequired strconcat " issued within the last " strconcat PaystubPeriod strconcat " month(s)" strconcat cvs /error_msg xdef

action_details.action_description: set error_msg = error_msg + " Needed to support the eligibility of the client " + the clientApplying's individual's cin
action_details.action_postfix: error_msg " Needed to support the eligibility of the client " strconcat 0 local@ entitypush individual entitypop entitypush cin entitypop strconcat cvs /error_msg xdef

attribute_fields.comments: Tests the Age requirements and documents the results with an ElgibilityFactor

initial_action_details.initial_action_description: add the EligibilityFactor to the EligibilityFactors;
set the Information = ""+ (years from (date) Individual.dob to the current_date) + " years";
initial_action_details.initial_action_postfix: "" Individual.dob cvd current_date yearsbetween strconcat " years" strconcat cvs /Information xdef

condition_details.condition_comment: Must be 18 or younger
condition_details.condition_description: years from (date) Individual.dob to the current_date <= 18

action_details.action_comment: We have no valid age specified for this client
Age disqualifies this client
Indicate this factor's role in determining eligibility
The individual is eligible for SCHIP
action_details.action_description: add MI if not a member to the EligibilityFactor.statusModifiers and to the program.statusModifiers
action_details.action_postfix: MI EligibilityFactor.statusModifiers over add_no_dups program.statusModifiers swap add_no_dups

action_details.action_comment: We clear the program status if to date they are still elgibile. If we find a factor that disqualifies them, then we want the result to be "N"
If no dob is provided, this is MI and we cannot determine eligibility
If we have a date of birth, but no verification, MV
action_details.action_description: add MV if not a member the to EligibilityFactor.statusModifiers and to the program.statusModifiers
action_details.action_postfix: MV EligibilityFactor.statusModifiers over add_no_dups program.statusModifiers swap add_no_dups

condition_details.condition_comment: Individual.medicaid is only null if we are missing that information from the application
Individuals enrolled in Medicaid are not eligible for SCHIP
We will only change the program status based on this Eligibility Factor if none of the previous factors have failed.
This test allows us to disable a column by simply putting a "N" in that column

action_details.action_postfix: "Client enrolled in Medicaid cannot enroll in SCHIP" cvs /Information xdef

action_details.action_postfix: "Application must indicate Medicaid enrollment" cvs /Information xdef

action_details.action_comment: Indicate that we have a Missing Verification issue in evaluating this eligiblity factor

context_details.context_description: for all result.individuals

condition_details.condition_comment: We create Edg Groups only for people applying for programs
condition_details.condition_postfix: programs_applied_for entitypush pgm_type_applied_for cvs entitypop SCHIP streq

action_details.action_comment: Create a new Edg_group

action_details.action_comment: This person is applying for SCHIP

attribute_fields.comments: Add all the individuals on the application to the edg_group. In the real world, the rules of who belongs in the edg_group and who doesn't can be quite complex.

context_details.context_description: for all individuals

condition_details.condition_comment: Go through the list of individuals, but don't recreate the edg_individual for the individual around which we are building this group (That has already been done)
condition_details.condition_postfix: edg_group entitypush edg_individual entitypop entitypush individual entitypop individual.individual req

action_details.action_comment: Build an Edg_individual around this individual
action_details.action_description: add a new edg_individual entity to the context of this table

action_details.action_comment: Add the edg_individual to the edg_group's list
action_details.action_description: add the edg_individual to the edg_group.edg_individuals

action_details.action_comment: add the edg_group individual to the edg_group's list
action_details.action_description: add the edg_group's edg_individual to the edg_group.edg_individuals
action_details.action_postfix: edg_group entitypush edg_individual entitypop edg_group.edg_individuals swap addto

action_details.action_comment: Point the edg_individual to the individual on the application

context_details.context_description: for all edg_groups
for all edg_individuals
add the edg_individual.individual to the context of this table

action_details.action_comment: Every wage earner gets wage earner deduction
action_details.action_description: set the individualIncome's deductions's monthlyAmount = the wage_earner_deduction
action_details.action_postfix: wage_earner_deduction cvr individualIncome entitypush deductions entitypop entitypush /monthlyAmount xdef entitypop

action_details.action_comment: Add 'em up for the household
action_details.action_description: add wage_earner_deduction to the householdIncome's deductions's monthlyAmount
action_details.action_postfix: wage_earner_deduction householdIncome entitypush deductions entitypop entitypush monthlyAmount f+ /monthlyAmount xdef entitypop

action_details.action_description: set the individualIncome's net's monthlyAmount = the individualIncome's gross's monthlyAmount - the individualIncome's deductions's monthlyamount
action_details.action_postfix: individualIncome entitypush gross entitypop entitypush monthlyAmount entitypop individualIncome entitypush deductions entitypop entitypush monthlyamount entitypop fsub cvr individualIncome entitypush net entitypop entitypush /monthlyAmount xdef entitypop

action_details.action_description: set the householdIncome's net's monthlyAmount = the householdIncome's gross's monthlyAmount - the householdIncome's deductions's monthlyamount
action_details.action_postfix: householdIncome entitypush gross entitypop entitypush monthlyAmount entitypop householdIncome entitypush deductions entitypop entitypush monthlyamount entitypop fsub cvr householdIncome entitypush net entitypop entitypush /monthlyAmount xdef entitypop

initial_action_details.initial_action_description: sort the individual.income_documents in descending order by $document_date

condition_details.condition_comment: The application claims an income if the income field is not null
Only look at the application if we don't have any income from verifiable sources

action_details.action_comment: Use the values given from the paystubs over the values provided in the application if at all possible.
action_details.action_description: set the individualIncome's gross's monthlyamount = the edg_individual.averageMonthlyPay;
action_details.action_postfix: edg_individual.averageMonthlyPay cvr individualIncome entitypush gross entitypop entitypush /monthlyamount xdef entitypop

action_details.action_comment: Calculate the household income
action_details.action_description: add the individualIncome's gross's monthlyamount to the householdIncome's gross's monthlyAmount
action_details.action_postfix: individualIncome entitypush gross entitypop entitypush monthlyamount entitypop householdIncome entitypush gross entitypop entitypush monthlyAmount f+ /monthlyAmount xdef entitypop

action_details.action_comment: Remember, this will overwrite the source set above if we have paystubs
Even if we get the income from the application, set this value for reporting reasons
action_details.action_description: set the edg_individual.averageMonthlyPay = the individualIncome's gross's monthlyamount
action_details.action_postfix: individualIncome entitypush gross entitypop entitypush monthlyamount entitypop cvr /edg_individual.averageMonthlyPay xdef

context_details.context_description: local double monthlyScale = 1.0
for all the individual.income_documents where the document_metadata's doc_subtype == paystub_subtype
context_details.context_postfix: { dup document_metadata entitypush doc_subtype cvs entitypop paystub_subtype streq if } individual.income_documents forall pop

condition_details.condition_comment: Once we have enough paystubs, we are done.

condition_details.condition_description: The months from (date) pstb_payperiod_end_date to the first of the month of the current_date <= PaystubPeriod
condition_details.condition_postfix: pstb_payperiod_end_date cvs cvd current_date firstofmonth monthsbetween PaystubPeriod <=

Compute Average Monthly Pay
action_details.action_postfix: averageMonthlyPay edg_individual.numberPaystubsProvided 1 - fmul monthlyPay fadd edg_individual.numberPaystubsUsed fdiv cvr /averageMonthlyPay xdef

bi-weekly conversion
semi-monthly conversion
monthly needs no conversion

action_details.action_postfix: pstb_gross_pay_amount cvs cvr 0 local@ fmul cvr /monthlyPay xdef

for all earned_incomes
local double monthlyScale = 1
local double local_monthlyPay = 0

condition_details.condition_comment: frequency of the paystub
frequency of the paystub
frequency of the paystub
frequency of the paystub
Did we get income from verifiable sources?

action_details.action_comment: Weekly conversion
bi-weekly conversion
semi-monthly conversion
monthly needs no conversion

action_details.action_description: set the local_monthlyPay = (double) einc_gross_pay * the monthlyScale
action_details.action_postfix: einc_gross_pay cvs cvr 0 local@ fmul cvr 1 local!

action_details.action_description: add local_monthlyPay to the IndividualIncome's gross's monthlyAmount
action_details.action_postfix: 1 local@ IndividualIncome entitypush gross entitypop entitypush monthlyAmount f+ /monthlyAmount xdef entitypop

action_details.action_comment: We keep a version of the monthly pay on the application
Clone our application, and put the clone into our lists (this way we can put multiple copies of the application pointing to different subsections in our source tracking)
action_details.action_description: add a clone of the schip_application to the context of this table; set the subsection = earned_income;
action_details.action_postfix: schip_application clone entitypush earned_income cve /subsection xdef

action_details.action_comment: The schip_application is a document entity. Here we are putting the cloned application into our lists. This helps us get around the problem that we don't allow duplication in these lists.
action_details.action_description: add the document if not a member to edg_individual.income_documents_used;

action_details.action_comment: We put our clone into the edg_individual's income document list
action_details.action_description: add the document to the edg_individual.income_documents;

action_details.action_comment: Mark that we have some income data
Mark that we have income information

context_details.context_description: for all individual.citizenship_documents
add the document_metadata to the context of this table
add the document_payload_data to the context of this table

condition_details.condition_comment: We will use the birth certificate if we have to, but will prefer the passport

action_details.action_comment: Note that the individual is a citizen
Note that their citizenship is also verified
Ignore any other documents we might have found

action_details.action_description: add the document if not a member to the citizenship_documents_used

action_details.action_comment: Note we have a birth certificate, but we don't need to use it.
action_details.action_description: add the document if not a member to the citizenship_documents

context_details.context_description: for all individual.dob_documents
add the document_metadata to the context of this table
add the document_payload_data to the context of this table

action_details.action_postfix: birth_certificate entitypush brth_individual entitypop entitypush brth_cert_dob cvs entitypop cvs /individual.dob xdef

action_details.action_description: add the document if not a member to the dob_documents_used
add the document if not a member to the dob_documents

context_details.context_description: for all eligibilityIndividuals
for all edg_groups
add the program to the context of this table

action_details.action_comment: If eligible for SCHIP, then suggest that program
If this indiviudal isn't eligibile, then we need to remove all MI/MV records generated for this individual.
action_details.action_description: for all MI_MV_records where the MI_MV_record.edg_individual == the edg_group's edg_individual remove the MI_MV_record from the MI_MV_records array
action_details.action_postfix: { { MI_MV_records MI_MV_record remove pop } MI_MV_record.edg_individual edg_group entitypush edg_individual entitypop req if } MI_MV_records forallr

condition_details.condition_comment: Are there any potentially eligible clients?
condition_details.condition_description: is there an edg_group where the edg_group's program's status == "Y"
condition_details.condition_postfix: { true } { false } { edg_group entitypush program entitypop entitypush status entitypop "Y" streq } edg_groups forfirstelse

condition_details.condition_description: is there an edg_group where the edg_group's program's status == ""
condition_details.condition_postfix: { true } { false } { edg_group entitypush program entitypop entitypush status entitypop "" streq } edg_groups forfirstelse
